query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Biodesign engagement and support
result.description: Report summarising the activities organised and supported in Phases 1 & 2 up to month 15, using evaluation templates developed in WP5. result.title: Water companies and solutions report
result.description: This deliverable will show the results on searching for water companies, classified by sector, innovation skills and previous participation in EU funded activities. result.title: Stakeholder engagement plan
result.description: To ensure the practical relevance of the work carried out in the various WPs of CARISMA, the input of key stakeholders will be gathered primarily through workshops focusing on technical issues. A stakeholder engagement plan developed here will be further elaborated and regularly updated in consultation with the Advisory Board. The interest of key stakeholders will be maintained through incentives, such as peer-to-peer data sharing, ability to find partners for new research and development projects, ability to create synergies with other projects by sharing results.

result.title: Communication and consultation plan
result.description: The preliminary communication and consultation plan (this deliverable) will be elaborated further for every 6-month period, and will specify the communication and consultation activities. The main priority of the plan is twofold: first, to plan the consultation process to acquire knowledge on an ongoing basis and second to communicate it to the target audiences, including, as appropriate, European, national and local policymakers, business stakeholders, and the scientific community.

project.title: Monitoring system of the environmental and social sustainability and circularity of industrial bio-based systems

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe‚Äôs financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‚ÄòDigital transition‚Äô).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe‚Äôs financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe‚Äôs financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe‚Äôs financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe‚Äôs financial contribution to Europe‚Äôs biodiversity‚Äôs path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.

category.title: HORIZON JU Coordination and Support Actions
category.description: HORIZON JU Coordination and Support Actions

programme.title: Developing and validating monitoring systems of environmental sustainability and circularity: collection of best practices and benchmarks

category.title: Topic
category.description: Programme: Part of the Commission work programme implementing legal basis

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe‚Äôs financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‚ÄòDigital transition‚Äô).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe‚Äôs financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe‚Äôs financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe‚Äôs financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe‚Äôs financial contribution to Europe‚Äôs biodiversity‚Äôs path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.

result.title: Social impact monitoring methodology and assessment
result.description: Report on social impact (positive or negative) of project‚Äôs interventions: higher education in WP4 and vocational training programmes in WP5, green portal in WP3, stakeholder joint initiative in WP2.
